flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=1030>>1030 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 1030*0.7=<<1030*0.7=721>>721 votes
So the other candidate got 1030-721=<<1030-721=309>>309 votes
This means he got 309-150=<<309-150=159>>159 more votes than John.
#### 159

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 1030. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
